DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Transcriptome analysis of Botryococcus braunii (strain BOT88-2)
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: A novel EST dataset of Botryococcus braunii (strain BOT88-2) was generated by the 454 pyrosequencing technique.
DESCRIPTOR.CENTER_PROJECT_NAME: Core Research for Evolutional Science and Technology funded by Japan Science and Technology Agency
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: The transcriptome of oil-producing green algae Botryococcus braunii (strain BOT88-2) was analyzed by generating a novel EST dataset via the 454 pyrosequencing technique.
